|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8072;QCA8072, 0VV, PK629STC, K062900; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = MU-MIMO, 256QAM |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.0.50 |defaultlogin = Admin |defaultpass = |defaultssid = dlink-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/17/2017 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0711TPWZY |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = 400 |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 400 |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Renamed as the ''AC1300 Gigabit Wi-Fi Extender (COVR-1300E)'' *[http://us.dlink.com/press-centre/press-releases/covr/ ''New D-Link Covr Wi-Fi System Delivers Seamless High-Power Wi-Fi
Throughout Entire Home'' on '''D-Link (US)'''] Part of the [http://us.dlink.com/products/connect/covr-ac3900-whole-home-wi-fi-system/ ''Covr AC3900 Whole Home Wi-Fi System (COVR-3902)''] including: * Covr AC2600 Seamless Wi-Fi Router (COVR-2600R) * Covr AC1300 Seamless Wi-Fi Range Extender (COVR-1300E) ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.techhive.com/article/3153887/network-router/d-links-covr-home-networking-line-router-with-wireless-powerline-extenders.html ''D-Linkâ€™s Covr home networking line pairs a high-end router with
wireless and powerline range extenders'' on '''TechHive'''] :'''D-Link Covr AC3900 Whole Home Wi-Fi System (COVR-3902)''' :The Covr Wi-Fi Kit (DKT-883) consists of a :*[[D-Link DIR-883 rev A1]] - ''AC2600 MU-MIMO Dual-band Router'' and :*D-Link DAP-1655 rev A1 - ''AC1300 Gigabit Wi-FI Extender'' ==See also== *[[D-Link DHP-W732AV]] - ''Covr PowerLine AV2 1300 Adapter'' *[[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[D-Link COVR series]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
